Content.Name: Typography
Content.Title: Typography
Content.Abstract: BYU-Idaho web typography and style guide.
Content.BodyCopy:
The Web Builder platform includes a comprehensive style guide in it's CSS files. For the most part, authors do not need to consider typography in their page designs. Clean HTML markup will be style appropriately.

For those few exceptions that need to define style, we provide the following.

Backgrounds

Rust
